        program combined
          implicit none

          ! Step 1: variables for the first program
          integer :: n, i, j, r, temp, len_i, total_digits, digit, radix, tmp, total_digits_seen
          integer, allocatable :: a(:), b(:)
          character(len=20) :: temp_str   ! for converting an integer to string

          ! Step 2: variables for the second program
          integer :: mod_cnt(0:2018)   ! from 0 to 2018
          integer(kind=8) :: ans2   ! because ans might be large (long in Java)

          ! Step 3: variables for the third program
          character(len=100) :: S2   ! 100 digits for a long integer is enough
          integer :: length
          character :: c

          ! Step 1: read n
          read(*,*) n
          allocate(a(n), b(n))

          ! Read the array a
          do i = 1, n
              read(*,*) a(i)
          end do

          ! Step 2: compute r and b
          r = 0
          do i = 1, n
              r = ieor(r, a(i))
          end do
          do i = 1, n
              b(i) = ieor(r, a(i))
          end do

          ! Count total_digits for the second program
          total_digits = 0
          do i = 1, n
              write(temp_str, '(I0)') b(i)
              len_i = len_trim(temp_str)
              total_digits = total_digits + len_i
          end do

          ! If there are no digits, then total_digits=0, but we have to handle.
          ! Initialize for the second program
          radix = 1
          mod_cnt = 0
          total_digits_seen = 0
          tmp = 0   ! dummy
          ! We'll use a variable 'prev' to store the mod_arr value for the previous digit (the digit to the right in the string)
          integer :: prev

          ! If there are no digits, we skip the loop.
          if (total_digits > 0) then
            ! We'll process the array b in reverse order (from last element to first) and for each integer, we process its string representation in reverse order (from last char to first)
            prev = 0   ! for the first digit (the last in the string) we have no previous -> we use 0 for the previous value? 
            do i = n, 1, -1
                write(temp_str, '(I0)') b(i)
                len_i = len_trim(temp_str)
                do j = len_i, 1, -1
                    digit = ichar(temp_str(j:j)) - ichar('0')
                    tmp = digit * radix
                    if (total_digits_seen > 0) then
                        tmp = tmp + prev
                    end if
                    tmp = mod(tmp, 2019)
                    if (tmp < 0) then
                        tmp = tmp + 2019
                    end if
                    mod_cnt(tmp) = mod_cnt(tmp) + 1
                    ! Update prev for the next digit (which will be to the left of this one)
                    prev = tmp
                    radix = mod(radix * 10, 2019)
                    if (radix < 0) then
                        radix = radix + 2019
                    end if
                    total_digits_seen = total_digits_seen + 1
                end do
            end do
          end if

          ! Step: add one for the empty substring (or for remainder 0)
          mod_cnt(0) = mod_cnt(0) + 1

          ! Step: compute ans2
          ans2 = 0
          do i = 0, 2018
              ans2 = ans2 + int(mod_cnt(i), kind=8) * (mod_cnt(i)-1) / 2
          end do

          ! Convert ans2 to a string in S2
          write(S2, '(I0)') ans2

          ! Step: third program
          length = len_trim(S2)
          c = ' '
          ! If the string is empty, then we have to handle, but ans2 is at least 0.
          do i = length, 1, -1
              if (S2(i:i) /= ' ' .and. S2(i:i) /= '?') then
                  c = S2(i:i)
                  exit
              end if
          end do

          ! Convert c to lowercase if it is uppercase
          if (c >= 'A' .and. c <= 'Z') then
              c = char(ichar(c) + 32)
          end if

          if (c == 'a' .or. c=='e' .or. c=='i' .or. c=='o' .or. c=='u' .or. c=='y') then
              write(*,*) "YES"
          else
              write(*,*) "NO"
          end if

        end program combined
